Tic Tac Toe have four mode to play.
 	1. one player mode
 	2. two player mode
 	3. win 3 consecutively 2P
 	4. win 3 consecutively 1P

 Lets train your logical thinking skills!

This is a player against a bot 

Player score will be increased by one every time when they win the game. 

A result dialog will be displayed showing the score and the play time, whenever the player lost the game. 

The player can decide if they are willing to enter their name into the leader board.

The two player mode is player against player. 

Both players will take turns to play the game. 

A restart option from the menu will be provided for players to restart the game when they feel like to.
The win 3 consecutively 2P mode is also similar to the two player mode. \n\nBut it includes two layers of TicTacToe.
The win 3 consecutively 1P mode is also similar to the one player mode. \n\nBut it includes two layers of TicTacToe.
